name: Business Wars - The Card Game
description:
Business wars is a hardcore mix of strategy battles and business theory card game. Use your unique deck facing the business world situation, discover all possible strategy, and be the TOP 1 CEO in the business world!



Features
  • Dynamic Deck Building: Choose your cards wisely! Discover hundreds of cards to add to your deck with each attempt at climbing TOP CEO in the word. Select cards that work together to efficiently dispatch foes and reach the top.
  • Opponent Company Select: Pick your opponent every time until you be Rank 1. Choose the opponent wisely, all different opponent company will need a different strategy to defeat! know your deck limit before you make the decision!
  • Facing the Situation Waves: Different situation will appearing on Forcast Phase, Coming Phase, Current Phase and Critical Phase. Those situations will keep moving forward until either settle by you or settle your company. If you don’t settle those situations, you even not able to touch the opponent company.



    Content:
    • 5 selectable company that each have their own unique set of cards.
    • 130+ fully implemented cards.
    • 45+ unique situation encounters.
    • 20+ opponent company to challenge
